sentences.english: We all jumped out from behind the bushes, roaring and slobbering.
sentences.chinese: 我們齊刷刷地從草叢裏跳出來，咆哮着，淌着口水。

sentences.english: Ten pairs of startled eyes looked at him.
sentences.chinese: 十雙驚愕的眼睛齊刷刷地看着他。
